summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3961 for the improvement of 46th Avenue Southwest, form West Dakota Street to West Spokane Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48225, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
